entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saturna Island 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: SE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Clearing before morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
